text: Congratulations to our nine incredible physicians at UAMS who have been named Healthcare Research All-Stars! Your dedication and hard work have placed you among the top 5% nationwide in publishing leading-edge research, further solidifying UAMS' reputation for excellence. Kudos also to our Hip and Knee surgery team for ranking in the top 1%, and our Orthopaedic, Gastrointestinal, and General surgery teams for making it to the top 3% and 5%. This is a testament to UAMS' unwavering commitment to quality patient care, medical education, and research. Keep up the fantastic work!
